title: How to Play Balloon Hackey Sac

steps.headline: Start off with a large balloon, such as a punching balloon.
steps.description: Play in a room that isn't very large, and may have some stuff in it, like a small bedroom. This is best because there are obstacles to avoid, and the bed can be used for style points.

steps.headline: Divide the room into two sides.
steps.description: Each player starts on one side, and you choose who serves first.

steps.headline: Have the first player serve without using his or her hands.
steps.description: Keep passing the balloon back and forth until it hits the ground. The person whose side it lands on loses, and the other person gains 1 point.

steps.headline: Whoever wins the point serves next.
steps.description: Switch every time the points add up to equal multiples of 5 (ex, 5-0, 3-5, 7-8, etc.)

steps.headline: Score style points.
steps.description: To do this, you must hit the balloon to the other side with great flair. You can only score that point if you win the round. Both players must agree that it was a style point.

steps.headline: Play until one player scores 10 points.
